comments.body: @cloud-fan can you explain all these non-test changes in Pr description too? Seems like it's not test only

This is the only one, as I don't want to special-case broadcast in the new `ValidateRequirements` like `EnsureRequirements` did, but I can do that to avoid making this change (it doesn't have any real impact though)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +348,352 @@
  override def satisfies0(required: Distribution): Boolean = required match {
    case UnspecifiedDistribution => true
    case BroadcastDistribution(m) if m == mode => true
    case _ => false
